Components_Example_Title: @pep-addons/ngx-lib : Pepperi Components - Library components written with Angular10
Open_Catalog_Settings_Description:
The Open Catalog Add-on allows you to publish a catalog of your Pepperi products to a web page with no user registration required.
The data and configuration for the catalog are exported from Pepperi and published to a high-speed database that allows for super-fast search and filtering.
Pepperi provides an API for web site developers to access this database and display the information on your web site, as well as a WordPress Plugin that automatically publishes the catalog on your web site.
Open_Catalog_Name_Description:
Enter a name for the Open Catalog. A Transaction with this name will be created in which you will configure views and other options used by the Open Catalog.
Editing this name will not change the Transaction name after it was created.
Pepperi_Catalog_Description: The catalog defined in Pepperi that is associated with this Open Catalog. It cannot be changed after the Open Catalog is created.
Access_Key_Description: An access key for the Pepperi Open Catalog API. This key is valid for this catalog only.
Scheduled_Job_Description: Schedule the repeating occurrences for exporting the data of the open catalog
Delete_Open_Catalog_Description:
Deleting this Open Catalog will permanently remove all configuration and published data, and API requests will fail.
Make sure you are not using this Open Catalog. This action cannot be reverted!
Revoke_Access_Key_Description:
Anyone with access to this key will no longer be able to authenticate this Open Catalog API.
Once revoked a new key will be generated.

Open_Catalog_MESSAGES.PreviewFailed: Failed to open Open Catalog Preview
Open_Catalog_MESSAGES.SaveNameFailed: Failed to save Open Catalog Name
Open_Catalog_MESSAGES.SaveScheduledJobFailed: Failed to save Scheduled Job Info
